summary: Just a small patch that combines the Requiem balancing with RND's hunger and thirst fulfillment.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://diannetea.com/rndfoodpatchlogo.png[/img][/center]

[size=3]I wanted to try [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19281]Requiem[/url] with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26228]Realistic Needs and Diseases[/url], but the fact that food could either feed me or give a small attribute replenishment put me off. After searching for a few hours I decided I had to do something about it.

This is an attempt to balance the two mods, as well as fix a few RND issues, such as raw meat weighing 2 and the cooked versions weighing .6, and reordering food/drink text because I'm ocd like that.

If you find an issue or think something needs to be changed, please post or send me a message!

[center][img]http://diannetea.com/loadorder.png[/img][/center]
If you do not use BOSS (wha..?), this is the proper load order.
---
Requiem.esp
RealisticNeedsandDiseases.esp
RND_Requiem-Patch.esp (idk what else this alters, patch provided in RND Patch Pack)
RND Requiem Food Patch.esp
---

[center][img]http://diannetea.com/changelog.png[/img][/center]
v0.3 - updated to RND 1.9.9, currently only Dawnguard for DLC. Will be adding a file with ALL DLC requirements later today (same version number since there are no other changes except adding DLC food.) Fixed Strange Meat to remove disease chance.

v0.2 - updated to RND 1.9.8, this version requires ALL DLC. Use version 1.0 if you do not have them. This is not a requirement by me, this is a decision made by Persied9. Also, Requiem does not have any of these set, so I pretty much had to make up numbers across the board. Hopefully they aren't out of whack, please let me know in the discussion tab if there is a problem.

[center][img]http://diannetea.com/credits.png[/img]
Persied9
Ogerboss
for their amazing mods <3[/center][/size]
author: diannetea
